Reservation_Info.description: Additional booking details (e.g., 'Phone only', 'Online only') in English. Use 'N/A' if empty.

time_slot.description: Use 24-hour format 'HH:MM - HH:MM'. If the restaurant is closed on these days, strictly use the word 'Closed'.

Opening_Hours.description: List of day/time slots. If no days are listed, assume Mon-Sun.
